title: Panzanella
source: My Kitchen in Rome - Rachel Roddy
categories: My Kitchen in Rome - Rachel Roddy
ingredients: 2¼pounds mixed tomatoes, the best you can find
directions: Chop the tomatoes roughly and put them in a large bowl. Tear in the basil and mint leaves, and add oil and a pinch of salt. Stir and leave to sit for about 10 minutes. Meanwhile, tear the bread into manageable pieces and, using your hands, toss it with the tomatoes and their juices. Leave to sit for another 10 minutes or so, before tossing again and serving.
